text:
I worked with the poi-3.0.1-FINAL-20070705.jar and the
poi-3.0.2-beta1-20071204.jar. I had the problem that the created files with HSSF
crashes Excel 97 when I tried to open this files. With the old
poi-2.5.1-final-20040804.jar everthing worked just fine, apart from the problem
with the java.lang.outOfMemmory exception when amount of the rows written by
HSSF exceeds about 3500 rows. The new versions crahses Excel 97 if the user has
no write authorizations on the specific folder.
creator: markus.scheid@tesat.de

text:
You could argue that excel shouldn't crash no matter what file you feed it

If the same file opens fine in other versions of excel, then you'll probably be
best off reporting a bug to Microsoft
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
dfisher@jmlafferty.com
text: Without a response or further information, I am resolving this as "INVALID"
